visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data for a year. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors for the series and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The x-axis represents the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters. The data series includes monthly rainfall data for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. Additional configurations such as chart margins, background color, and legend settings are also included to enhance the visual appeal and functionality of the chart. The loading configuration allows for a loading indicator to be shown when the chart is being updated or loaded.
